content.title: Grant to Meritorious Wards of Ex-Servicemen in Academics (Lump Sum Grant)
content.beneficiary: Academically meritorious wards of Ex-Servicemen and Widows of Ex-Servicemen
content.details: 'Grant to Meritorious Wards of Ex-Servicemen in Academics (Lump Sum Grant)' is a Welfare Scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. Through this scheme, the academically meritorious wards of the Ex-Servicemen (ESM) / Widows of ESM who have secured the top three ranks in academics are provided with lump sum grants of upto ₹18,000. The application should be submitted within three months from the date of publication of the result of the respective exam.
eligibility: The applicant should be a Ward of an ESM / Ward of the Widow of an ESM.

The applicant should have secured 1st/2nd/3rd Rank in Class 10th/12th in a Government-recognized Institution, or should have secured gold medal in Graduation/Postgraduation in a Government-recognized University.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested applicant should take print of the prescribed format of the application form for the concerned scheme, fill in all mandatory fields, attach required documents, and submit to the concerned authority.
documents_required: Identity Card of the ESM / Widow of the ESM
Birth Certificate of the Ward (if not already registered with the DSW)
Study Certificate of the Ward (if not already registered with the DSW)

faqs.question: Which Department of the UT of Puducherry administers this scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is administered by the Department of Sainik Welfare, Union Territory of Puducherry.

faqs.question: Where can I find the URL of the Official Website of the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry?
faqs.answer: The URL of the Official Website of the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry is: https://sainik.py.gov.in/

faqs.question: Are Short Service/Emergency commissioned Officers eligible for the status of ex-servicemen?
faqs.answer: Yes, if released on completion of the specific period of engagement and were given gratuity at the time of release.

faqs.question: What is the definition of 'Ex-Servicemen' for the purpose of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The definition of 'Ex-Servicemen' can be accessed through the following URL: https://sainik.py.gov.in/definition-ex-servicemen
